articles.title: Adhir Ranjan slammed for ‘koi safed, koi kala, Negrita class’ remark amid Sam Pitroda's 'African, Chinese' comparison | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Sam Pitroda, who resigned as Indian Overseas Congress chairman, stoked a controversy when he cited ethnic and racial identities like Chinese, Africans, Arabs and Whites to describe the physical appearance of Indians from different parts of the country.
articles.content: Congress MP from Bahrampur Adhir Ranjan Chowdhary possibly caused more trouble for his party when he seemingly defended Sam Pitroda's Chinese, African analogy. Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) leader She… [+2361 chars]
